content: this is a summary of a legal case in estonia that took four months to resolve the harju county court made a final decision on december 28 2020 the case involved two parties mv and hb and was about the division of common property the court ruled that hb must compensate mv with 6500 euros for their share of the joint property which includes a trailer and funds in bank accounts the trailer will be transferred to mvs sole ownership and the funds will be divided equally between mv and hb hb is also ordered to pay 3050 euros to mv as compensation both parties are responsible for the procedural costs the plaintiff has 30 days to appeal the default judgment and the defendant has the same option the defendant must respond or initiate an enforcement procedure within 30 days the joint assets of the parties include a car a trailer and funds in bank accounts the plaintiff requests compensation for the transfer of the vehicle without their consent the court may satisfy the claim by default if the defendant does not respond the court will determine the distribution of procedural costs which can be appealed the document is signed by the judge and the specific code articles mentioned are §xxxxx

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
